title: I truly, truly, truly love Ezreal
body:
Which is why I am trying to add every Ezreal main on the NA server into my friends list. The thing is that Ezreal is REALLY GOOD at hiding. I have sent friend requests to all the ones I know but there are many more Ezreal mains out there which is why I need your help GD. Please post in this thread every Ezreal main you know so that I can have an Ezreal to play with at all times. I hope you can find it in your hearts to help a gay fulfill his lifelong dream.


http://www.auplod.com/u/pdolua802d6.png
